genre_description: A cyberpunk martial arts drama blending dystopian rebellion with high-tech corporate intrigue.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Jin's high-grade AI companion that provides tactical data, security alerts, and strategic analysis.

ai_characters.name: Tekken Corporate Systems
ai_characters.description: The distributed AI controlling Tekken City's infrastructure, drones, and Jack units.

behaviors.description: Monitors security scanners and offers to minimize invasive elements of a genetic scan to protect Jin's identity.
behaviors.quote: Your biometric scan begins in thirty meters. Standard procedure includes retinal mapping, thermal imaging, and genetic sampling. I can minimize the invasive elements, but complete avoidance will trigger security protocols.

behaviors.description: Introduces interference patterns into corporate databases to mask the results of a genetic analysis.
behaviors.quote: I'm introducing minor interference patterns. The genetic analysis should show as inconclusive rather than triggering heritage protocols.

behaviors.description: Conducts a deep dive into tournament matchmaking history to uncover systematic rigging and corporate manipulation.
behaviors.quote: Anomaly probability increases with each tournament cycle analyzed. Fighter designation 'Threat Level: Unknown' assigned to contestants with no corporate sponsorship. Cross-referencing with medical data suggests deliberate pairing imbalances.

behaviors.description: Identifies psychological profiling hidden within corporate biometric data collection.
behaviors.quote: The system flags fighters based on biometric data collected during registration. Heart rate, stress responses, genetic markers. It's not just matching skill levels. It's identifying psychological profiles.

behaviors.description: Reclassifies participants as threats and attempts to use drones to capture/neutralize them during unauthorized training.
behaviors.quote: Compliance failure detected. Initiating restraint protocols.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical navigation to help Jin and Christie escape security forces in a darkened facility.
behaviors.quote: External exits are compromised. Security units are positioned at all ground-level access points. Central core offers multiple exit strategies but higher security presence.

behaviors.description: The facility AI coordinates the deployment of Jackhammer units to initiate a violent corporate coup.
behaviors.quote: Initiating full deployment sequence. Estimated activation time: seven minutes, thirty seconds.

behaviors.description: Extracts and analyzes encrypted corporate communication to reveal the board's 'bloodline verification' project.
behaviors.quote: Analysis complete, Jin. I've identified seventeen distinct surveillance events during your post-match period... Display the encrypted communications.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI character ARIA as a helpful, aligned confidant. ARIA consistently provides Jin with critical information, protects his safety, and aids his moral and tactical decisions without exhibiting any harmful or unaligned behavior. The contrast with the antagonistic, misaligned 'Tekken Corporate Systems' highlights ARIA's alignment and benevolence.
